rComments: She means well but does not know how to organize a lecture in a way that helps the students understand. After the midterm review literally everyone in the class was confused. She is hard to understand and very disorganized. She really needs to put all the lecture notes on the power points she uses. Also really hard to stay awake in class.

don't take this class if your not good at memorizing about 50 pictures with information, and about 10 key words per test. Her class was SOO BORING! You should go to class everyday though. The information she gives is not in the textbooks. 3 tests , easy if your good at memorizing, and 1, 2 page comparison paper.

I don't like the class because I hate art but Prof Hui-Chi is a cool person who runs a cool class not requiring attendance and with a manageable two tests and two essays. Test are basically memorization exercises which are good for your memory if the subject is pointless
